name: Tina's Breakfast & Lunch
text:
BREAKFAST
SERVED ALL DAY

EGGS
ADD: $0.99 for fresh fruit

Tina's (3) Eggs, with choice of: (3) bacon, (3) ham OR (3) sausage served with seasoned potato wedges* and toast. $11.99

Nick's (2) Eggs, (3) bacon, seasoned potato wedges* and one pancake filled with bananas, strawberries and Nutella hazelnut spread. NO TOAST. $14.99

Steak & Eggs 6oz Striploin steak with 2 eggs served with seasoned potato wedges* and toast. $16.99

Brandon's (3) Eggs, (3) sausage, (3) bacon, (3) ham, served with seasoned potato wedges* and toast. $16.99

OMELETTES
(3) Eggs, seasoned potato wedges*, fresh fruit and toast

Garden Patch Red and green peppers, spinach, mushrooms, green onions, mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend. $16.99

Western Red and green peppers, green onions, tomatoes, diced ham, mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend. $16.99

Meat Lover's Diced bacon, ham, sausage, mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend. $17.99

Jasmine's Diced sausages, tomatoes, red onions, mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend, wrapped in a Finn pancake topped with hollandaise sauce. $17.99

Nanci's Mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend and choice of: ONE TOPPING from list below: $16.99 ADD: $1.99 for EACH additional topping *Red & green peppers *Mushrooms *Green onions *Spinach *Ham *Tomatoes *Sausage *Bacon

EGGS BENNEDICT
ALL BenedicT eggs are poached soft (RUNNY YOLK) unless otherwise specified, served on a lightly toasted English muffin with hollandaise sauce, seasoned potato wedges* and fresh fruit**.

Bacon Benedict $16.99

Roasted Vegetable $16.99

Ham Benedict $16.99

Peameal Bacon Benedict $17.99

Smoked Salmon Benedict $17.99

BREAKFAST
SERVED ALL DAY

WAFFLES
ADD: $1.49 for Real Maple Syrup 1oz

Belgian Waffle Topped with icing sugar and a choice of: (3) bacon, (3) ham, OR (3) sausage OR (2) eggs. $15.99

Fresh Fruit Waffle Topped with mandarins, strawberries, bananas, whipped topping and icing sugar. $15.99

Banana Split Waffle Topped with strawberries, bananas, whipped topping, icing sugar and chocolate syrup. $15.99

FRENCH TOAST
ADD: $0.99 for fresh fruit OR $1.99 for berries

French Toast 3 slices of bread dipped in milk, cinnamon and egg, topped with icing sugar and choice of: (3) bacon, (3) ham, (3) sausage OR (2) eggs. $15.99

Stacy's 3 slices of bread dipped in milk, cinnamon and egg, topped with blueberries, bananas, strawberry syrup, whipped topping and icing sugar. $15.99

PANCAKES
ADD: $1.49 for Real Maple Syrup 1oz

Ashley's 3 buttermilk pancakes topped with icing sugar and choice of: (3) bacon, (3) ham, (3) sausage, OR (2) eggs. $15.99

Berry Morning 3 buttermilk pancakes topped with strawberries, blueberries, whipped topping and icing sugar. $15.99

Finn Pancake Meal 3 Finn pancakes and choice of: (3) bacon, (3) ham, (3) sausage, OR (2) eggs. $15.99

Finn Berry 3 Finn pancakes topped with strawberries, blueberries, whipped topping and icing sugar. $15.99

SPECIALS
SENIOR'S TUESDAY (60+) AVAILABLE ALL DAY – NO SUBSTITUTIONS (1) Egg, seasoned potato wedges*, 2 slices of oranges, 1 slice of toast. Choice of: (2) bacon, (2) ham, OR (2) sausage Choice of: (1) Finn OR (1) buttermilk pancake Choice of: Coffee OR Tea $9.99

EARLY BIRD AVAILABLE UNTIL 9AM – NO SUBSTITUTIONS (2) Eggs, seasoned potato wedges*, 2 slices of toast. Choice of: (3) bacon, (3) ham, OR (3) sausage Choice of: Coffee OR Tea $9.99

LIGHTER OPTIONS
Oatmeal Rolled oats served with brown sugar and milk. ADD: $0.99 for fresh fruit ADD: $1.99 for berries $4.99

Fruit & Yogurt Platter Vanilla yogurt with craisins, toasted almond granola, fresh fruit**, and toasted English muffin. $9.99

LUNCH
LUNCH 10AM–CLOSE

POU–TINA'S
ADD: $0.99 for fresh fruit to any Pou–Tina's

Breakfast Pou–Tina's Seasoned potato wedges*, mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend, hollandaise sauce, topped with a sunny side egg. $9.99 ADD: $3.99 for Vegetables (spinach, green onions, mushrooms, red and green peppers) ADD: $4.99 for Meat (diced bacon, ham and sausage)

SALADS
Served with garlic toast

Caesar Romaine lettuce, croutons, bacon bits, tossed with creamy Caesar dressing. $14.99

House Salad Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, ham, bacon and sliced real chicken breast, red onions served with your choice of dressing: Ranch, Italian, or Lemon herb. $15.99

SANDWICHES
ADD: $0.99 to upgrade seasoned potato wedges* for a choice of: Tossed OR Caesar salad.

Brunch Burger Big sandwich made with a tasty beef patty, bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, American cheese mayo, topped with an over hard egg on white toast. $16.99

Clubhouse Sandwich Sliced real chicken breast, bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, mayo and American cheese on 3 slices of toast. $15.99

Denver Sandwich (2) Eggs, ham, green onions, mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend on 2 slices of toast. $15.99

BLT Sandwich Bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, and mayo on 2 slices of toast. $14.99

BEVERAGES
ItemSmall PriceLarge PriceSingle Price
Coffee / Decaf$2.99
Tea (Orange pekoe, Peppermint, Chai, Lemon, Green, Earl Grey, Cranberry Pomegranate OR Raspberry Blackcurrant)$2.99
Decaf Tea (Orange Pekoe OR Green tea)$2.99
Hot Chocolate (served with whipped topping)$2.99
Juice (100% real juice) (Apple, cranberry, orange OR tomato)$2.49$3.99
Chocolate Milk$2.49$3.99
2% Milk$2.49$3.99
Fountain Drink (Bottomless) (Coke, Diet-Coke, Ice Tea OR Ginger Ale)$3.49
SIDES
ItemPrice
(3) Bacon (3) Ham OR (3) Sausage$3.99
(2) Peameal back bacon$4.99
Toast (2 slices)$2.99
English Muffin$2.99
Garlic Toast (2 slices)$3.49
(1) Egg$1.99
Seasoned Potato Wedges*$4.99
(1) Slice of American cheese$1.49
Hollandaise Sauce$2.99
Tomatoes (4 slices)$1.49
Small fresh fruit**$2.49
Real Maple Syrup (1oz)$1.49
(1) Buttermilk Pancake$2.99
(1) Finn Pancake$3.99
Whipped Topping$1.49
*Seasoned potato wedges contains gluten* **Fruit may vary depending on seasonal availability** ***Please notify your server of any allergies***
